I can fix the test with n=5. But I am nowhere closer to the resolution here. The only good idea I have left is to step throughout Windows code with gdb or any other debugger. That should provide the explanation of what is happening here (why lastcontinuetramp, which is set by SetUnhandledExceptionFilter, is not called). But I have never done it before - not sure how big this job is. Perhaps we should leave it alone for now.

Alex
